item.title: The Lua 5.4 Binary Chunk Format.
item.description: Introduction Recently I decided that I wanted to take on the challenge of creating an assembler for Lua binary chunks. The main reason being simply that I really like Lua as a language, and it served as a fun way to learn more about it’s internals. A...

item.title: An Impractical Guide to a Perfect* Home Directory
item.description: Introduction I won’t start this post with the cliche spiel about how “The home directory is one of the most important locations for any linux user”. (as I imagine this sort of post on, medium.com, or a video essay might start) Or as a rant you’ve hea...
